content: You assume we are all sexually stable; while on the other hand, as I have become acquainted with people, I find that they are all perverted sinners, one way or another, that the whole society is corrupt and rotten and repressed and unconscious that it exhibits its repression in various forms of social sadism.
translations: ita:Si assume che tutti siamo sessualmente stabili; mentre d'altra parte, dato che ho fatto conoscenza con le persone, trovo
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Scott (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
